name: Ask Bob
description: press the "Start Asking" Button then think of a question the click to answer your question he is inspired by Billy from "KARLSON" press the Pause  menu to go back to main menu store is currently hidden and Press the "X" in the pause to continue playing you can barely see the  "TIME WITH BOB" count but it will have to bob's  are your money you get 20 every time you leave the AskCenter  and that's about it!
